name: Cybercrime Hacker 2015: The Official Video Game
name_original: Cybercrime Hacker 2015: The Official Video Game
description:
GOAL

Reach the green cube at the end of each level.

HOW TO PLAY

W - Reel in
S - Reel out
Space - Boost
Mouse 1 - Grapple
Mouse 2 - Release
R - Restart

Made as part of 7dfps 2018

The WebGL player seems to sometimes add some mouse lag, so download the standalone build if that is the case.

The windows build is available to download now, and I plan on adding OSX and Linux builds soon.

This is still missing a ton of features and content (like music, FOV scaling, and of course more levels)

The name has nothing to do with the actual game.
